comments.body: You can just `declare function warning(condition: any, format?: string, ...extra: any[]): void;`.

I can change this. Writing it this way was convenient as typescript would allow package to be imported using es6 syntax. Though to support es6 module import syntax (see below) I would have to add `declare namespace warning {}` like in https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/types-2.0/object-assign/index.d.ts
